sqlMap.select:
select
'n/a' as data,
cat.name as data,
'n/a' as objecttime,
DATE_FORMAT(st.objectTime,#dateformated:VARCHAR#) as objecttime,
sum(1) as quantity
1 as quantity
from STATISTIC st, PROF_PROD_CATEGORY cat where st.statType = 1 and st.objectId = cat.id
and objecttime >= #sFrom:TIMESTAMP#
and objecttime <= #sTo:TIMESTAMP#
cat.id, cat.name
DATE_FORMAT(st.objectTime,#dateformated:VARCHAR#)

select
'n/a' as data,
cat.name as data,
'n/a' as objecttime,
DATE_FORMAT(st.objectTime,#dateformated:VARCHAR#) as objecttime,
sum(1) as quantity
1 as quantity
from STATISTIC st, PROF_SERV_CATEGORY cat where st.statType = 1 and st.objectId = cat.id
and objecttime >= #sFrom:TIMESTAMP#
and objecttime <= #sTo:TIMESTAMP#
cat.id, cat.name
DATE_FORMAT(st.objectTime,#dateformated:VARCHAR#)

select
'n/a' as data,
geo4.nombre as data,
'n/a' as objecttime,
DATE_FORMAT(st.objectTime,#dateformated:VARCHAR#) as objecttime,
sum(1) as quantity
1 as quantity
from STATISTIC st, GEO4 geo4 where st.statType = 0 and st.extraId = 4 and st.objectId = geo4.id
and objecttime >= #sFrom:TIMESTAMP#
and objecttime <= #sTo:TIMESTAMP#
geo4.id, geo4.nombre
DATE_FORMAT(st.objectTime,#dateformated:VARCHAR#)
union
select
'n/a' as data,
geo3.nombre as data,
'n/a' as objecttime,
DATE_FORMAT(st.objectTime,#dateformated:VARCHAR#) as objecttime,
sum(1) as quantity
1 as quantity
from STATISTIC st, GEO3 geo3 where st.statType = 0 and st.extraId = 3 and st.objectId = geo3.id
and objecttime >= #sFrom:TIMESTAMP#
and objecttime <= #sTo:TIMESTAMP#
geo3.id, geo3.nombre
DATE_FORMAT(st.objectTime,#dateformated:VARCHAR#)
union
select
'n/a' as data,
geo2.nombre as data,
'n/a' as objecttime,
DATE_FORMAT(st.objectTime,#dateformated:VARCHAR#) as objecttime,
sum(1) as quantity
1 as quantity
from STATISTIC st, GEO2 geo2 where st.statType = 0 and st.extraId = 2 and st.objectId = geo2.id
and objecttime >= #sFrom:TIMESTAMP#
and objecttime <= #sTo:TIMESTAMP#
geo2.id, geo2.nombre
DATE_FORMAT(st.objectTime,#dateformated:VARCHAR#)

select
'n/a' as data,
prof.businessName as data,
'n/a' as objecttime,
DATE_FORMAT(st.objectTime,#dateformated:VARCHAR#) as objecttime,
sum(1) as quantity
1 as quantity
from STATISTIC st, PROFESIONAL prof where st.statType = 6 and st.objectId = prof.id
and objecttime >= #sFrom:TIMESTAMP#
and objecttime <= #sTo:TIMESTAMP#
prof.id, prof.businessName
DATE_FORMAT(st.objectTime,#dateformated:VARCHAR#)

select
'n/a' as data,
prof.businessName as data,
'n/a' as objecttime,
DATE_FORMAT(st.objectTime,#dateformated:VARCHAR#) as objecttime,
sum(1) as quantity
1 as quantity
from STATISTIC st, PROFESIONAL prof where st.statType = 7 and st.objectId = prof.id
and objecttime >= #sFrom:TIMESTAMP#
and objecttime <= #sTo:TIMESTAMP#
prof.id, prof.businessName
DATE_FORMAT(st.objectTime,#dateformated:VARCHAR#)

select
'n/a' as data,
'n/a' as data,
st.objectTime,
'n/a' as objecttime,
DATE_FORMAT(st.objectTime,#dateformated:VARCHAR#) as objecttime,

and objecttime >= #sFrom:TIMESTAMP#
and objecttime <= #sTo:TIMESTAMP#
DATE_FORMAT(st.objectTime,#dateformated:VARCHAR#)

select
'n/a' as data,
'n/a' as data,
st.objectTime,
'n/a' as objecttime,
DATE_FORMAT(st.objectTime,#dateformated:VARCHAR#) as objecttime,
sum(1) as quantity
1 as quantity
from STATISTIC st where st.statType = 9
and objecttime >= #sFrom:TIMESTAMP#
and objecttime <= #sTo:TIMESTAMP#
DATE_FORMAT(st.objectTime,#dateformated:VARCHAR#)
